basics.name: Sheng-Loong Su
basics.summary: Dynamic engineering leader with extensive experience in building scalable backend services and applications in early stage and Unicorn startups as well as "big tech" companies in Singapore and San Francisco. Skilled in Rust, with a strong foundation in compiled languages and full-stack development. Proven ability to lead cross-functional teams and thrive in flat organizational structures.

skills.name: Technologies
keywords: Backend: Scala, Rust, Java, Python, Spring Boot, Ruby on Rails
Frontend: JavaScript, Typescript, React, NextJS and D3.JS
Cloud native: Amazon Web Services, Google Cloud Platform
Big data engineering: Spark, Flink, Airflow, Redshift, Kafka
Functional Programming: Cats Effect, ZIO, Tagless Final

work.summary: Architected and developed high-availability backend services for banking integrations, using Java and Python. Managed a diverse team of engineers in a rapid development and daily deployments environment.
Engineered and scaled a pioneering multi-acquirer backend system. Instituted a company-wide continuous deployment process for daily software releases.
Developed and deployed secure, scalable payment solutions across APAC. Led technical assessments and integration of new banking partners.
Spearheaded the design and implementation of a messaging queue architecture, improving asynchronous data integration among distributed teams.
